meeting_info.organization: City Council Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Chambers and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes of the December 12, 2024, December 16, 2024, and December 23, 2024 meeting of the Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs.

agenda_items.title: Performance Review Process
agenda_items.description: City council appointed positions performance review process for City Manager, City Secretary, City Attorney, and Inspector General by Baker Tilly.

agenda_items.title: Recruiting Firms Presentations
agenda_items.description: Presentations of recruiting firms regarding the search for Inspector General.

agenda_items.title: Recruiting Firm Recommendation
agenda_items.description: Consider recommending a recruiting firm for search for Inspector General to city council.

agenda_items.title: Discussion of Goals and Metrics
agenda_items.description: Discussion of goals and performance review metrics, timeline, and schedule for annual evaluations for city council appointed positions - City Manager, City Secretary, City Attorney, and Inspector General.
